warning.title: Infection warning
warning.description: We have calculated that you may be infected.

inSync.lastUpload: Your data has been uploaded to {val}.
inSync.connected: It is connected to the Internet.

active.title: Location tracking is active
active.lastUpdate: Your location was last recorded a Minute ago

active.title: Contact details stored
active.description: You have entered all the necessary contact details.

welcome.title: Welcome to OHIOH
welcome.description: You will be guided in the Following step-by-step to the App.
welcome.advice: Swipe left for the next step!

language.title: Welcome
language.advice: The language can later be changed in the preferences.

what.title: What do you mean, OHIOH?
what.description: OHIOH stands for Our Health In Our Hands. It is a project that the spread of the Coronavirus is designed to counter.

why.title: Why should I use OHIOH?
why.description: The aim of the OHIOH-App the spread of viruses is to brake. the focus is on the Filter chain of Infection in the population under the protection of the personal decision for the User*in the nature and extent of the data. This approach allows for an early, Inform the user and the contact with Doctors*in. With the Information provided to Doctors*in, and the government, entrepreneurs and the users*in consistent chains of Infection can stop.

nextSteps.title: What's next?
nextSteps.description: In the next step, can be voluntarily registered data. You decide what data you make available.

userData.title: User data
userData.description: Here you can enter your data. No fields need to be filled.
userData.firstNameMaxLengthMessage: The first name may not exceed {val} characters.
userData.lastNameMaxLengthMessage: The last name may not exceed {val} characters.
userData.phoneMaxLengthMessage: The phone number may not be longer than {val} characters in length.
userData.minAgeValidationMessage: Your age must be greater than {val} year.
userData.maxAgeValidationMessage: Your age must be less than {val} years.
userData.cityMaxLengthMessage: The residence must not exceed {val} characters.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Here you can set the duration of storage of your data.

motivation.title: Formation and Motivation
motivation.description: At the Hackathon, the Federal government started it all. Through the framework, among other things, the OHIOH Team could quickly find themselves together in Teams. Since then, a concept, a website and App are from the idea of OHIOH become.

team.title: Team
team.description: The project OHIOH would not have been possible without the help of many individuals possible. It is unbelievable how these people without a reward for you ... no for all of us ... your the Best. Therefore, a small thanks to all of you:
team.university: The Professor*s*in the University of applied Sciences Kiel
team.thankYou: Thank you for the good cooperation!

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.description: Icons made by round icons from www.flaticon.com

infectionWarning.title: Infection warning
infectionWarning.description: We have identified an increased risk of infection.

nextSteps.maybeNotInfected: Possible way, you're not infected at all. Safty First
nextSteps.goToDoctor: Please search nevertheless, promptly see a doctor and discuss further action.
nextSteps.informAboutOhioh: Please tell the doctor that you are using the OHIOH APP
nextSteps.findSolution: It helps you quickly to find a solution
